import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Col, Container, Row, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import NavbarComp from '../Components/NavbarComp' const axios = require('axios') export default function Users() { var [users, setUsers] = useState([]) var t = 0 var displayUsers = () => { axios({ method: 'get', url: 'http://localhost:5000/api/users' }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) .then( response => setUsers(response.data)) } return
Show ALL users { users.map( (ele) => ( )) }
{++t % (users.length+1)} {ele.Name} {ele.Email}
